rule.name: Clean Linux OS Name
rule.comment:
/(SUSE|SunOS|Red Hat|CentOS|Ubuntu|Debian|Fedora|AlmaLinux|Oracle Linux)(?:\D+|)([\d.]+) ?(?:\(?([\w ]+)\)?)?/
Example : Ubuntu 22.04.1 LTS -> #0 = Ubuntu SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 11 (x86_64) ->#0 = SUSE SunOS -> #0 = SunOS Red Hat Enterprise Linux Server release 7.9 (Maipo) -> #0 = Red Hat Oracle Linux Server release 7.3 -> #0 = Oracle Linux Fedora release 36 (Thirty Six) -> #0 = Fedora Debian GNU/Linux 9.5 (stretch) -> #0 = Debian CentOS Stream release 8 -> #0 = CentOS AlmaLinux 9.0 (Emerald Puma) -> #0 = AlmaLinux

rule.name: Clean Linux OS Version
rule.comment:
/(SUSE|SunOS|Red Hat|CentOS|Ubuntu|Debian|Fedora|AlmaLinux|Oracle Linux)(?:\D+|)([\d.]+) ?(?:\(?([\w ]+)\)?)?/ For :
Ubuntu 22.04.1 LTS -> #1 = 22.04.1 SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 11 (x86_64) -> #1 = 11 SunOS 5.10 -> #1 = 5.10 Red Hat Enterprise Linux Server release 7.9 (Maipo) -> #1 = 7.9 Oracle Linux Server release 7.3 -> #1 = 7.3 Fedora release 36 (Thirty Six) -> #1 = 36 Debian GNU/Linux 9.5 (stretch) -> #1 = 9.5 CentOS release 6.9 (Final) -> #1 = 6.9 AlmaLinux 9.0 (Emerald Puma) -> #1 = 9.0

rule.name: Clean Linux OS Edition
rule.comment:
/(SUSE|SunOS|Red Hat|CentOS|Ubuntu|Debian|Fedora|AlmaLinux|Oracle Linux)(?:\D+|)([\d.]+) ?(?:\(?([\w ]+)\)?)?/ For :
Ubuntu 22.04.1 LTS -> #2 = LTS SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 11 (x86_64) -> #2 = x86_64 Red Hat Enterprise Linux Server release 7.9 (Maipo) -> #2 = Maipo Red Hat Enterprise Linux Server release 6.10 (Santiago) -> #2 = Santiago Fedora release 36 (Thirty Six) -> #2 = Thirty Six Debian GNU/Linux 9.5 (stretch) -> #2 = stretch Debian GNU/Linux 8.9 (jessie) -> #2 = jessie CentOS Linux release 7.2.1511 (Core) -> #2 = Core AlmaLinux 9.0 (Emerald Puma) -> #2 = Emerald Puma AlmaLinux 8.6 (Sky Tiger) -> #2 = Sky Tiger

rule.name: Clean Windows OS name
rule.comment:
/(Microsoft)(?>\(R\)|®)? (Windows) (XP|\d\.\d|\d{1,4}|Vista)(™)? ?(.*)/
Example : Microsoft Windows XP Professionnel -> #1 : Windows Microsoft Windows 7 Enterprise -> #1 : Windows Microsoft® Windows Vista Professionnel -> #1 : Windows Microsoft Windows XP Édition familiale -> #1 : Windows Microsoft Windows 10 Entreprise -> #1 : Windows Microsoft Windows 10 Professionnel -> #1 : Windows Microsoft Windows 11 Professionnel -> #1 : Windows

rule.name: Clean Windows OS Version
rule.comment:
/(Microsoft)(?>\(R\)|®)? (Windows) (XP|\d\.\d|\d{1,4}|Vista)(™)? ?(.*)/
Example : Microsoft Windows XP Professionnel -> #2 : XP Microsoft Windows 7 Enterprise -> #2 : 7 Microsoft® Windows Vista Professionnel -> #2 : Vista Microsoft Windows XP Édition familiale -> #2 : XP Microsoft Windows 10 Entreprise -> #2 : 10 Microsoft Windows 10 Professionnel -> #2 : 10 Microsoft Windows 11 Professionnel -> #2 : 11

rule.name: Clean Windows OS Edition
rule.comment:
/(Microsoft)(?>\(R\)|®)? (Windows) (XP|\d\.\d|\d{1,4}|Vista)(™)? ?(.*)/
Example : Microsoft Windows XP Professionnel -> #4 : Professionnel Microsoft Windows 7 Enterprise -> #4 : Enterprise Microsoft® Windows Vista Professionnel -> #4 : Professionnel Microsoft Windows XP Édition familiale -> #4 : Édition familiale Microsoft Windows 10 Entreprise -> #4 : Entreprise Microsoft Windows 10 Professionnel -> #4 : Professionnel Microsoft Windows 11 Professionnel -> #4 : Professionnel

rule.name: Clean Windows Server OS Name
rule.comment:
/(Microsoft)(?>\(R\)|®)? ((Hyper-V|Windows)(?>\(R\))?) ((?:Server|))((?>\(R\)|®))? (\d{4}(?: R2)?)(?:[,\s]++)?([^\s]*)(?: Edition(?: x64)?)?$/
Example : Microsoft Windows Server 2012 R2 Datacenter -> #2 #3 : Windows Server Microsoft(R) Windows(R) Server 2003, Standard Edition x64 -> #2 #3 : Windows Server Microsoft Hyper-V Server 2012 R2 -> #2 #3 : Hyper-V Server Microsoft® Windows Server® 2008 Standard -> #2 #3 : Windows Server

rule.name: Clean Windows Server OS Version
rule.comment:
/(Microsoft)(?>\(R\)|®)? ((Hyper-V|Windows)(?>\(R\))?) ((?:Server|))((?>\(R\)|®))? (\d{4}(?: R2)?)(?:[,\s]++)?([^\s]*)(?: Edition(?: x64)?)?$/
Example : Microsoft Windows Server 2012 R2 Datacenter -> #5 : 2012 R2 Microsoft(R) Windows(R) Server 2003, Standard Edition x64 -> #5 : 2003 Microsoft Hyper-V Server 2012 R2 -> #5 : 2012 R2 Microsoft® Windows Server® 2008 Standard -> #5 : 2008

rule.name: Clean Windows Server OS Edition
rule.comment:
/(Microsoft)(?>\(R\)|®)? ((Hyper-V|Windows)(?>\(R\))?) ((?:Server|))((?>\(R\)|®))? (\d{4}(?: R2)?)(?:[,\s]++)?([^\s]*)(?: Edition(?: x64)?)?$/
Example : Microsoft Windows Server 2012 R2 Datacenter -> #6 : Datacenter Microsoft(R) Windows(R) Server 2003, Standard Edition x64 -> #6 : Standard Microsoft Hyper-V Server 2012 R2 -> #6 : Microsoft® Windows Server® 2008 Standard -> #6 : Standard
